title: Judges; duties
context: §440-20 Judges; duties. The boxing commission may in its discretion appoint two judges to act with the referee in rendering a decision or three judges to act with a nonvoting referee in rendering a decision. [L 1929, c 216, §23; RL 1935, §7010; RL 1945, §7571; am L 1949, c 264, §11; RL 1955, §165-22; HRS §440-20; am L 1983, c 241, §17]
